body_html:
Modifying tensorflow/workspace.bzl NODE=path/to/node can fix it. I have built tensorflow success and test pass. build patch see build-tf-mips64.diff. Error and solution see build-tf-mips-error.log

[root@localhost tensorflow]# bazel build --copt=-march=native -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package --verbose_failures
...
At global scope:
cc1plus: warning: unrecognized command line option "-Wno-self-assign"
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package up-to-date:
  bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package
INFO: Elapsed time: 4934.384s, Critical Path: 240.49s


[root@localhost tensorflow]# bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
2017.06.07 Thir 10:59:09 CST : === Using tmpdir: /tmp/tmp.Fk3wTutAlo
/home/xzy/tensorflow/bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles /home/xzy/tensorflow
/home/xzy/tensorflow
/tmp/tmp.Fk3wTutAlo /home/xzy/tensorflow
2017.06.07  Thir 10:59:12 CST : === Building wheel
warning: no files found matching '*.dll' under directory '*'
warning: no files found matching '*.lib' under directory '*'
/home/xzy/tensorflow
2017. 06. 07  Thir 10:59:40 CST : === Output wheel file is in: /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
[root@localhost tensorflow_pkg]# pwd
/tmp/tensorflow_pkg
[root@localhost tensorflow_pkg]# ls
tensorflow-1.2.0rc1-cp27-none-linux_mips64.whl


# pip install /tmp/tensorflow_pkg/tensorflow-1.2.0rc1-cp27-none-linux_mips64.whl
...
    Installing /usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/protobuf-3.3.0-py2.7-nspkg.pth
  Found existing installation: six 1.7.3
    Uninstalling six:
      Successfully uninstalled six

Successfully installed tensorflow mock bleach markdown numpy html5lib protobuf six werkzeug funcsigs pbr

body:
Modifying `tensorflow/workspace.bzl` `NODE=path/to/node` can fix it. I have built tensorflow success and test pass. build patch see [build-tf-mips64.diff](https://github.com/xzy256/tensorflow-mips/blob/master/build-tf-mips.diff). Error and solution see [build-tf-mips-error.log]() 
[root@localhost tensorflow]# bazel build --copt=-march=native -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package --verbose_failures
...
